content:
Write an SMS message to a Taylormade golf customer that filled out the following survey

Let's get to know you better! How do you swing?
Right handed
Which of the below needs the most improvement?
Driving
What is your handicap?
6-10
Are your current golf clubs custom fit or do they have stock specs?
Stock specs off the rack
What type of products would you like to see recommendations for today?
Driver
Tell us about your budget goals.
Price Conscious
Do you like personalised or limited edition products?
Yes, l love unique products
What are you looking for help with today?
Men's
What is your age?
45
What is your height? Feet/inches
6' 4"
What's your on-course style? Shorts vs. pants, curve bill vs flat bill hat, etc.
Casual
